alert.note: Alert for Inland Citrus; Inland Levy (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued September 08 at 5:25PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: .Deep moisture streaming into the Florida peninsula from the Gulf of Mexico will lead to multiple rounds of heavy rainfall through at least Saturday. ...FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of west central Florida, including the following areas, Coastal and Inland Levy, Citrus, Hernando, and Pasco counties, and Pinellas county. * WHEN...From Friday morning through Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - https://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
